creator: raghavkumar1988@gmail.com
text:
Hi

I am recording a Web application using JMeter.And once my recording is finished,i am replaying the script and for some HTTP requests recorded,there is no response 
and the render html ,show text etc.. radio buttons are disabled

Pls tel me a way to handle these responses too in my script

creator: raghavkumar1988@gmail.com
text: There are no erros in Jmeter log file

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: WHat does the "Sample Response" page show?

creator: raghavkumar1988@gmail.com
text:
Hi sebb,

Actually an action is calling from javascript,where i am providing a server id
once the sampler executes it has to  return the list of clients with taht id

so response is to contain the list of clients with the given id

I'll try once more:

What does the "Sample Response" tab show for the sample results that have an empty "Response Data" tab?
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
For an empty Sampler it is showing nothing.

One thing is If a hit a URL from browser it is showing response.

If i frame the same url in JMX script and trying to run in jmeter it is showing no response

Please see the attchment

Attachment 1: Showing the Requested URL and it response in JMETER

ATtachment 2:Same URL Response in Web-browser
creator: raghavkumar1988@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 24985
Attachment 1 Respons ein JMeter
creator: raghavkumar1988@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 24986
Attachment 2 Response in browser
creator: raghavkumar1988@gmail.com

text:
One last time:

What does the "Sampler response" tab show? This is the tab to the left of the "Request" tab.
creator: sebb@apache.org
raghavkumar1988@gmail.com
text: Hi sebb,This is showing empty response,and the Tabs at the border are disabled

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The tabs cannot be disabled, otherwise you would not be able to show the screen shots from the "Request" and "Response data" tabs.

Please try again.

creator: raghavkumar1988@gmail.com
text: please see the attachments that i have sent to you where in response page the tabs are disabled

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: The tabs are at the top of the page and are not disabled.

Hi Sebb,Leave about the tabs...

Why we  are unable to see the response for a request ,which we are able to do from web browser
creator: raghavkumar1988@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text: The "Sampler result" tab has important information on it that is needed to debug the issue.

creator: raghavkumar1988@gmail.com
text:
Hi sebb,

I am telling about the tabs that are at the bottom like render html,render XML,Show text are disabled, not the tabs sample result,request,response etc...

I repeat: the "Sampler result" tab has important information on it that is needed to debug the issue.

If you cannot provide this information then there's not much anyone can do to help.
creator: sebb@apache.org
